text: Ek aur qisam ke munafiq tumhein aise milenge jo chahte hain ke tumse bhi aman mein rahein aur apni qaum se bhi, magar jab kabhi fitne ka mauqa payenge usmein kood padenge. Aisey log agar tumhare muqable se baaz na rahein aur sulah o salamati tumhare aagey pesh na karein aur apne haath na rokein to jahan woh milein unhein pakdo aur maaro, unpar haath uthane ke liye humne tumhein khuli hujjat de di hai
